Just like great style, our app is ever evolving. The latest features, fixes and tweaks make it easier than ever to feed your fashion habit.
•Recently searched terms now save automatically so you can easily look them up again
•Our product reviews got a makeover (hello, stars!)
•Swoon! Our Wish Lists are now decked out in hearts
•You can now see which items are available for pickup at your local store

•Improved functionality for iPhone X users.

•Alerts to remind you when a Loyallist Reward is about to expire.
